description: This source file implements the accept task for a TCP daemon server, handling incoming socket connections, creating socket objects, performing SSL/TLS setup if enabled, and assigning sockets to engine objects within a server architecture.

classes.name: ANSC_DAEMON_SERVER_TCP_OBJECT
classes.description: Main TCP server object managing listening socket, engine queue, and active state.

classes.name: PANSC_DSTO_WORKER_OBJECT
classes.description: Worker object responsible for accepting or rejecting incoming connections.

classes.name: PANSC_DAEMON_ENGINE_TCP_OBJECT
classes.description: Engine object managing socket processing and load balancing.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDstoAcceptTask(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Main task loop for accepting incoming TCP connections, creating socket objects, setting up TLS if needed, and assigning sockets to engines.
